problem_text_cn: 如图,四边形ABCD内接于⊙O,F是⁀{CD}上一点,且⁀{DF}=⁀{BC},连接CF并延长交AD的延长线于点E,连接AC．若∠ABC=105°,∠BAC=30°,则∠E的度数为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the quadrilateral ABCD is inscribed in ⊙O, F is a point on ⁀CD, and ⁀DF = ⁀BC. Connect CF and extend to intersect the extended line of AD at point E, connect AC. If ∠ABC = N_0, ∠BAC = N_1, then the degree of ∠E is ()
raw_comment: 本题考查的是圆内接四边形的性质,熟知圆内接四边形的对角互补是解答此题的关键．
